utterances: But, Kucinich and a maybe about 20 other Democrats have been pushing this issue for the - from the beginning for the longest time talking about, you know - shall we say, dishonest information about the decision to go to war in Iraq.

Why not vote to have this debate out in the open?
So 165 Republicans voted for the Kucinich resolution and it passed overwhelmingly.
